scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:alpine && npm run build:ember && npm run build:jquery && npm run build:mithril && npm run build:preact && npm run build:react && npm run build:stencil && npm run build:svelte && npm run build:vanilla && npm run build:vue
scripts.build:prepare: shx rm -rf ./dist && shx mkdir ./dist && shx mkdir ./dist/alpine && shx mkdir ./dist/ember && shx mkdir ./dist/jquery && shx mkdir ./dist/mithril && shx mkdir ./dist/preact && shx mkdir ./dist/react && shx mkdir ./dist/stencil && shx mkdir ./dist/svelte && shx mkdir ./dist/vanilla && shx mkdir ./dist/vue && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/alpine/* ./dist/alpine && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/ember/* ./dist/ember && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/jquery/* ./dist/jquery && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/mithril/* ./dist/mithril && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/preact/* ./dist/preact && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/react/* ./dist/react && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/stencil/* ./dist/stencil && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/svelte/* ./dist/svelte && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/vanilla/* ./dist/vanilla && shx cp -rf ./.hosting/vue/* ./dist/vue
scripts.build:ember: cd ./ember && npm run build && shx cp -rf ./dist/* ../dist/ember/public
scripts.build:preact: cd ./preact && npm run build && shx cp -rf ./build/* ../dist/preact/public
scripts.build:react: cd ./react && npm run build && shx cp -rf ./build/* ../dist/react/public
scripts.build:stencil: cd ./stencil && npm run build && shx cp -rf ./www/* ../dist/stencil/public
scripts.build:svelte: cd ./svelte && npm run build && shx cp -rf ./dist/* ../dist/svelte/public
scripts.build:vue: cd ./vue && npm run build && shx cp -rf ./dist/* ../dist/vue/public
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:alpine && npm run deploy:ember && npm run deploy:jquery && npm run deploy:mithril && npm run deploy:preact && npm run deploy:react && npm run deploy:stencil && npm run deploy:svelte && npm run deploy:vanilla && npm run deploy:vue
